title: The Scent of Rose Petals
description: -A Short Story-In post-World War II Manhattan, an unexpected romance develops between a lowly bank guard and a mysterious, powerful superheroine.A prequel to the superhero novel JUST CAUSE!* Although listed in the Graphic Novels/Superheroes category, this is not a graphic novel, but that's the only place to find the Superhero genre.
author: Ian Thomas Healy
